Package danogl.util

Class Counter

java.lang.Object
danogl.util.Counter
public class Counter
extends java.lang.Object
A simple class implementing a counter. This can be used instead of a primitive integer where you wish the integer to be passed by reference. In other words, when one object alters the value of the counter, the change is visible in another object with the same object-reference.
Author:
Dan Nirel

    Constructors
